metadata.title: CVE-2018-19532 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the functionPdfTranslator::setTarget() in pdftranslator.cpp of PoDoFo 0.9.6, whilecreating the PdfXObject, as demonstrated by podofoimpose. It allows anattacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
